prog04

Class Spaceship

  • java.lang.Object
    • prog04.GraphicObject
      • prog04.Spaceship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnimatedObject, ApplicationConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeyframedSpaceship

    public class Spaceship
extends GraphicObject
implements ApplicationConstants, AnimatedObject
    This is the class that creates the spaceship
    Author:
    Paige Courtemanche

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(float x,
                        float y)
        Performs a hierarchical search to determine whether the point received as parameter is inside the ship.
        Specified by:
        isInside in class GraphicObject
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of a point in the world reference frame
        y - y coordinate of a point in the world reference frame
        Returns:
        true if the point at (x, y) lies inside this face object.
